meanings.definition: To alter or enhance a photograph or image using an airbrush.
meanings.sent1: She airbrushed the photo to remove imperfections.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover was airbrushed to make the model look flawless.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he wished he could airbrush his own appearance in real life.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like an airbrushed painting, beautiful but not entirely real.
meanings.sent5: The artist skillfully airbrushed the mural on the wall, bringing it to life.

meanings.definition: Having been altered or enhanced using an airbrush.
meanings.sent1: The airbrushed image looked too perfect to be true.
meanings.sent2: The airbrushed car gleamed under the showroom lights.
meanings.sent3: The airbrushed cake seemed almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her airbrushed smile hid the sadness in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The airbrushed clouds in the painting added a dreamy quality to the scene.
